issue.title: [C++] Provide method on AdaptiveIntBuilder for appending integer Array types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5984](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5984). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For Int8/16/32, it is not currently possible to do a bulk append. With Int64, you can bulk append with `AppendValues` but only if you have no nulls or of the nulls are stored in a byte map
